title: Idea: Top Challenger 5v5 Team's Vs Bronze 5v5 (With URF)
body:
Hey Riot,
Top Challenger 5v5 Team's Vs Bronze 5v5 (With URF)

Just some one of novelty matches for the fun of it what people can watch via twitch (or wat ever), see if challenger teams can beat it. 
If bronze is to easy for them you can always increase the rank of the URF team

Cheers,
God
